name: dvelimnf
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wnf(s2, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wnf(s2, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w0))

|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w0))
-| diffsw(s2, w0)

comment: Version of ~ dvelim using "not free" notation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Oct-2016.)
